messages.text:
Hello! I'm Video Agent, your AI assistant for creating amazing videos.

Here is a plan for your video about nature:

Topic	A short video showcasing the beauty of nature.
Audience	General audience interested in relaxation and nature appreciation.
Music Theme	Calm, ambient instrumental with nature sounds.
Video Length	10 seconds.
Video Orientation	Landscape.
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic.
Target Language	English (United States).
Avatar	The user-provided avatar 
Sunny Smile
.
Voice	The voice of the provided avatar.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of scenic nature footage.
Captions	Disabled.

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.
Great! I've successfully generated the video based on your plan. Let me know what you think, or if you'd like to create another video.
